original_text: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.
korean_text: 나의 앞날이 주의 손에 있사오니 내 원수들과 나를 핍박하는 자들의 손에서 나를 건져 주소서

sentences.original_text: My times are in thy hand
deliver me from the hand of mine enemies
and from them that persecute me
